message: *WORK FROM HOME OPPORTUNITY!* Tired of job hunting? We’re hiring part-time associates for a premium US-based client.  Payouts: ₹5,000–₹25,000/week  Flexible hours  No prior experience needed Fill this 1-minute interest form: https://bit.ly/WorkConnectApply
Hey everyone, this is real work. I made ₹8,000 last week working only 3 hours/day
Thanks for the feedback  We’ve been operational since 2021. Check our Insta: @workconnect_india
I filled the form. What next?
Great! You’ll get your onboarding task pack after registration.  *One-time fee*: ₹799  Pay via UPI: `9988776655@oksbi` (RealJob Connect Pvt Ltd)  Send screenshot here for confirmation.
Sent ₹799  Waiting for my next steps.
Confirmed  Your login and task links will be mailed within 30 mins. Check promotions/spam if not in inbox.
Is this really genuine? So many scams these days...
Totally valid concern. But I’ve been working here since March. Got consistent weekly payouts.
I just paid ₹799 to `9988776655@oksbi`. Let's see.
Confirmed  You’re in Survey Batch A. Tasks begin today at 11 AM.
Done with payment from `7766056789@ybl`. Hope this is worth it.
Received  Check your inbox and spam for the activation mail.
Just paid now as well. Fingers crossed
Welcome! You’re assigned to Form Review Task B. Details coming via mail.
Okay, I’m convinced. Paid now.
Confirmed  Prep material and access instructions coming soon.
Anyone here actually completed work and got paid?
Yes. I was skeptical too, but it’s all been smooth. Proofs available in DM.
*Day 1 Task Reminder* All batches must submit assigned work before 6 PM today to qualify for payout.
I filled the form yesterday but didn’t get any email.
Please check your spam folder. If it’s not there, drop us a DM. We'll resend your access.
How does this even work? Is it copy-paste work or actual typing tasks?
Mostly data validation, survey forms, and quick feedback-based input. Simple to do on mobile too.
Alright, I just paid ₹499 to `workconnect@oksbi`. Waiting for confirmation.
Confirmed  You’re in Batch X2. Task mail will reach you within the next 30 minutes.
Still unsure. These payments upfront don’t feel safe.
I felt the same when I joined. But trust me, I got ₹1,500 just last Friday. They’re responsive too.
Hmm. But so many scams these days. What makes this different?
Fair question. We’re GST-registered, CIN-listed, and operational since 2021.  support@workconnect.co.in | CIN: U74110MH2024PTC778899
I actually DM’d them once and got a real human reply in 2 mins. Rare these days.
Okay… just paid now. Will give this a try.
Confirmed  Welcome to Batch Z1. First task will be shared before 10 AM.
If I don’t get any task, will I be refunded?
Of course. Full refund if you don't receive onboarding within 48 hours. Zero risk.
Got my mail. Everything looks fine now.
